,
from game
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into game (id, name, icon, url, ios_id, recommend, identifier, total, sort, score, create_time, modify_time, description) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iosId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recommend,jdbcType=BIT}, #{identifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{total,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update game
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon = #{record.icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{record.url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ios_id = #{record.iosId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
recommend = #{record.recommend,jdbcType=BIT},

total = #{record.total,jdbcType=INTEGER},

create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modify_time = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
description = #{record.description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},

update game

icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ios_id = #{iosId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
